name: Hyper Balls
description:
Hyper Balls is a short game, currently contains 2 different minigames (Marble Run , Crystal Cavern)

Marble Run:

In this minigame you are controlling a maze with your mouse to move the ball to the hole and run out of the maze. Be careful because if the ball bounced out of the maze and couldn't get into it again, then you will lose. 

This minigame currently contains just 2 levels and you should pass them under 30 seconds.

Crystal Cavern:

In this minigame you are a ball in a cave !!!

You have to collect all Crystals to pass the level, and there is no timer in this minigame.

You can restart the level only in this minigame by pressing the R key.

This minigame currently contains just 2 levels.

NOTE:

THIS IS A BETA VERSION SO YOU MIGHT FIND BUGS AND THIS BUILD DOESN'T REPRESENT THE FINAL QUALITY...

Please feel free to report any bug or mention upgrades for upcoming releases.
